name: Holobots Stadium
description:
Turn based mecha strategy game  in which you'll have to destroy the enemy army!

Available on Windows, Android, Mac and Linux! Description:

In Holobots Stadium the player will have to use their units to attack the enemies and destroy them. To do this they will have to use their units' abilities, situated on the bottom left corner of the screen. To use them they will have to click on them (or use the shortcut on Desktop). To see any unit's health the player must hover over that unit.

The first two levels feature one AI oponent, the third level  features local pvp. The second level and PVP level feature random map generation, your games will never be the same! Controls:
